title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When I launch the Help view on March 26, 2002, on Windows 2000, the tab key does not respond or perform any action.
EB: We should ensure that the Help view is accessible and can be navigated immediately via the keyboard.
SR: To reproduce the issue, launch the Help view on Windows 2000 and try navigating using the tab key.
